code:
flowchart TD
    Start([Start]) --> Init[n = 10000; count = 0; i = 2]
    Init --> OuterCond{i <= n?}
    OuterCond -->|No| Print[println count]
    Print --> End([End])
    OuterCond -->|Yes| InnerInit[d = 2; f = true]
    InnerInit --> InnerCond{d * d <= i?}
    InnerCond -->|No| CheckPrime{f?}
    InnerCond -->|Yes| CheckFlag{f?}
    CheckFlag -->|No| CheckPrime
    CheckFlag -->|Yes| Divisible{i % d == 0?}
    Divisible -->|Yes| NotPrime[f = false]
    NotPrime --> IncD[d = d + 1]
    Divisible -->|No| IncD
    IncD --> InnerCond
    CheckPrime -->|Yes| IncCount[count = count + 1]
    IncCount --> IncI[i = i + 1]
    CheckPrime -->|No| IncI
    IncI --> OuterCond
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
